goal.en: Learn the simulation, design, manufacturing and inspection technology of volumetric holographic optical components.
goal.ch: 學習體積全像光學元件之模擬、設計、製造與檢測技術。

content.en:
1. Theory of volumetric holographic optical elements
(1) Couple Mode theory; (2) RCWA?; (3)VOHIL.
2. Application and design of volumetric holographic optical components
(1) Holographic data storage; (2) Near eye display; (3) Other applications.
3. Manufacturing and testing of volumetric holographic optical components
(1) Recording methods; (2) Diffraction efficiency; (3) Angular selectivity; (4) Noise; (5) Optical diffraction tomography.
content.ch:
1. 體積全像光學元件的理論
(1) Couple Mode theory; (2) RCWA?; (3)VOHIL。
2. 體積全像光學元件的應用與設計
(1) Holographic data storage; (2) Near eye display; (3) Other applications。
3. 體積全像光學元件的製造與檢測
(1) Recording methods; (2) Diffraction efficiency; (3) Angular selectivity; (4) Noise; (5) Optical diffraction tomography。
